description:
Sil and his butler, Orgelt, destroy the old castle that the Varia are occupying. Sil is pleased that he easily dealt with the Varia all at once. But in one of the rooms of the destroyed castle, future Xanxus is sitting in a chair unharmed. Xanxus provokes his enemies by yawning in front of them. Orgelt attacks with his Elefante Forte Pioggia, but Xanxus smashes the elephant into pieces with a single powerful blow! Is the giant animal hidden behind Xanxus his box weapon?!
Source: crunchyroll
